featured.text: Circular shapes are also stronger and resist deformation, and therefore can 20 extreme differences in pressure inside and outside of an aircraft.

definition.zh_def: 變形，指物體因外力作用而改變形狀或結構的過程。
definition.en_def: The process of changing the shape or structure of an object due to external forces.
definition.example: The metal showed signs of deformation after being subjected to high pressure.
